list.title: Secretaria
list.subtitle: Job available since Nov. 17 2016
list.ad_subtitle: We’re looking for individuals with point of sales experience and solving in-store client needs.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: We’re a building material store from Matamoros, Tamaulipas and we’re looking for an individual from Matamoros to join our team and help welcome and attend in-store clients.

sections.title: Job Details
sections.content: You are experienced with invoicing software and have the ability and interest to learn the basics of accounting. You also have knowledge of managing and working with email, estimating project pricing, charging, and attending client calls.

list.title: Chofer
list.subtitle: Job available since Nov. 14 2016
list.ad_subtitle: We’re looking for a chofer with multi-state truck experience to join our team.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: We’re a building material store in Matamoros, Tamaulipas looking for an individual with experience driving any type of truck or 18-wheeler and with the physical health and strength required to load and unload heavy construction materials such as steel rebars, cement bags, and construction sand.

sections.title: Job Details
sections.content: You have a local chofer license, truck driving expertise and can maintain a clean vehicle at all times. You will be working with an assistant and have the ability and interest to lead and work alongside your fellow employees.

list.title: Assistant Chofer

sections.title: Introducción
sections.content: We’re a building material store in Matamoros, Tamaulipas and we’re looking for an individual with good physical strength and health to load and unload heavy construction materials throughout the day.

sections.title: Job Details
sections.content: You're have great collaborative skills and are a great team worker. You are also strong and healthy enough to load and unload cement bags, steel rebars, and construction sand.
